docs.snippet: Hit once again by penalties from the N.C.A.A., Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim damaged a university where he has been a revered figure....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hit once again by penalties from the N.C.A.A., Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim damaged a university where he has been a revered figure.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column holds that, in order to maintain academic integrity, Syracuse University should get rid of men's basketball coach Jim Boeheim, despite his decades-long involvement with team; NCAA has leveled harsh penalties against Syracuse for severe infractions that apparently extend back more than a decade.

headline.main: A Coach Woven in Syracuse’s Fabric Oversees Its Unraveling
headline.print_headline: A Coach Woven in Syracuse’s Fabric Oversees Its Unraveling

docs.snippet: Companies like Ford, Procter & Gamble, Under Armour and the Spanish bank BBVA are working to outmaneuver start-ups for dominance on mobile devices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Companies like Ford, Procter & Gamble, Under Armour and the Spanish bank BBVA are working to outmaneuver start-ups for dominance on mobile devices.
docs.abstract: Smartphones and mobile apps are presenting challenge for old-line industries to offer mobile capabilities that customers want before start-ups and other tech firms outmaneuver them; price of devices has fallen steeply, and companies that take advantage of new mobile technologies could experience sharply higher growth.

headline.main: Surge in Smartphones Sets Off New Wave of Corporate Self-Reinvention
headline.print_headline: Surge in Smartphones Sets Off New Wave of Corporate Self-Reinvention

docs.snippet: The future of the Saints and the Pelicans is at stake as their owner, Tom Benson, and his wife of 10 years battle his children, who sued to declare him mentally unfit....
docs.lead_paragraph: The future of the Saints and the Pelicans is at stake as their owner, Tom Benson, and his wife of 10 years battle his children, who sued to declare him mentally unfit.
docs.abstract: Controversy surrounds New Orleans Saints and New Orleans Pelicans as owner Tom Benson is sued by daughter Renee and her two children over his decision to bequeath teams to his wife Gayle rather than to them; suit seeks to have Benson declared mentally unfit and to put Renee in charge of his property and person.

headline.seo: Tom Benson and His Family Are Locked in Inheritance Dispute Over Saints and Pelicans
headline.main: Saints’ Owner Marches Out of Step With His Heirs’ Expectations
headline.print_headline: Saints’ Owner Marches Out of Step With His Heirs’ Expectations
